column6:
With Lady Bullseye on his trail, Daredevil must protect an old blind man who holds the key to the Hand's destruction! It's an all-out kung-fu ninja battle in the heart of New York City, and everyone who can kick is invited! By Ed Brubaker and Michael Lark.,2008,12
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Marko Djurdjevic | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | penciller:Michael Lark
